charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED JUDGMENT 1/5/2009 -- Defendant's offense level is amended to 21 pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 3582 (c) (2), U.S.S.G. 1B1.10, and the defendant's previously imposed sentence of imprisonment of 84 months is reduced to 70 months or time served if defendant's sentence exceeds the amount of time already served. charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED JUDGEMNT: 10/29/2008 - defendant's offense level is amended to 25 pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 3582 (c) (2) U.S.S.G. 1B1.10 and defendant's previously imposed sentence of imprisonment of 70 months is reduced to 57 months. All other terms and conditions of the initial sentence remain in full force and effect. Defendant committed to the custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 70 months followed by 5 years of supervised release with standard/special conditions. $100 special assessment. Forfeiture of $10,091.03 in U. S. Currency, seized February 10, 2005.
